::Shadow Wing::

She held up 4 fingers for Lunarpine. "Now tell me how many fingers 
I'm holding up."  She held them right in front of his face.  She knew 
that if he would swallow his pride long enough, this might work and 
maybe, by the grace of the Matrix, Lunarpine would have his sight 
back.
